document_data.mainbody:
Scatter was a conjuration spell that teleported several creatures to different nearby locations.
The spell targeted up to five creatures within a range of  and teleported those who failed to resist the effect each to a visible location of the casters choice within a range of . The spell could not teleport anyone to a point in mid-air, however it was necessary that a surface existed under every destination spot.
The spell required only a verbal component.
